snippet: Theodore V. Wells Jr., the lawyer who led the N.F.L.-commissioned investigation of the Patriots’ deflated footballs, responded forcefully to those who questioned his independence.
abstract: Theodore V Wells Jr, director of NFL-commissioned investigation into whether New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady conspired to underinflate footballs, rejects suggestions that his report was biased.
lead_paragraph: Theodore V. Wells Jr., the lawyer who led the N.F.L.-commissioned investigation of the Patriots’ deflated footballs, responded forcefully to those who questioned his independence.

headline.main: Wells, Brady Investigation Director, Criticizes Report’s Critics
